altername_name: World Team Speedway Championships: England's Challenge
name: World Team Championship: England's Challenge
overview: You are England's Manager with a squad of 13 riders embarking on a league programme to determine the four teams to contest the ultimate Final. Competition is fierce but with you as England's manager there will be no doubt. There are 3 levels of difficulty of play to choose from. You can modify riders, but not stats. Get started and you immediately start on the prelims. A commercial\shareware racing manager simulation from Eddie Thewlis released by ET Software in 1995.
